channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Australia news live: thousands join paddle-out in honour of Bondi victims; Coalition calls for new powers to strip citizenship
item.description: Surfers enter the ocean to pay tribute to the victims of Sunday’s Hanukah terror attack. Follow today’s news live Get our breaking news email , free a...

item.title: ICE meets snow as midwesterners fight back against Trump immigration raids
item.description: Videos show people in Minnesota and Illinois throwing snowballs at federal agents trying to arrest residents ICE, meet snow. As federal agents aggress...

item.title: Farage avoids police investigation over alleged electoral law breach
item.description: Essex force says report is outside time limit for prosecution, while Electoral Commission says it has not found any undeclared spending Nigel Farage h...

item.title: Trump’s $1,776 ‘warrior dividend’ repurposed from military housing aid
item.description: President claims bonus the result of tariff revenue but stipend had already been approved in tax-and-spend bill When Donald Trump promised a one-time ...

item.title: Trump signs order reclassifying marijuana as less dangerous
item.description: Change will loosen limits on research and certain regulations but stops short of making marijuana legal Donald Trump on Thursday signed an executive o...

item.title: Violence breaks out in Bangladesh after death of youth protest leader
item.description: Sharif Osman Hadi was a prominent figure in the movement that ousted former prime minister Sheik Hasina.

item.title: Ex-Nascar driver and family believed to be among seven killed in US aircrash
item.description: Officials confirm racer Greg Biffle was among those who boarded the small aircraft that crashed at a regional airport in North Carolina.

item.title: Watch: British woman surfs potentially record-breaking monster wave
item.description: Laura Crane, a 30-year-old from Devon, hopes to have broken a world record for the biggest wave ever surfed by a woman.

item.title: McIlroy wins Sports Personality of the Year 2025
item.description: Rory McIlroy is crowned BBC Sports Personality of the Year for 2025 after clinching the career Grand Slam and playing a key role in Europe's Ryder Cup...

item.title: Kennedy Center to be renamed Trump-Kennedy Center, White House says
item.description: The board of the performing arts centre, which was appointed by Trump, voted to rename it to honour him, the White House press secretary says.
